hero.title: Discover Your Perfect Career Path
hero.subtitle: Take our comprehensive assessment to unlock personalized career recommendations based on your skills, interests, and goals.

personalizedAssessment.title: Personalized Assessment
personalizedAssessment.description: Advanced algorithms analyze your unique profile to provide tailored career recommendations.

dataDrivenInsights.title: Data-Driven Insights
dataDrivenInsights.description: Make informed decisions with comprehensive market data and career trend analysis.

careerRoadmap.title: Career Roadmap
careerRoadmap.description: Get step-by-step guidance on how to achieve your career goals with actionable plans.

expertGuidance.title: Expert Guidance
expertGuidance.description: Connect with industry professionals and career counselors for personalized advice.

academicIntegration.title: Academic Integration
academicIntegration.description: Seamlessly connect your academic background with potential career opportunities.

mobileExperience.title: Mobile Experience
mobileExperience.description: Access your career insights anytime, anywhere with our responsive mobile platform.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Your Career Path?
cta.description: Join thousands of students who have found their perfect career match through our platform.

footer.description: Empowering students to make informed career decisions through personalized assessments and expert guidance.
